cause.description:
Stonewall Democrats is the national voice of LGBT Democrats.
We are a grassroots network connecting LGBT Democrats from Seattle, Washington to Austin, Texas to Little Rock, Arkansas to Atlanta, Georgia. With more than 90 chapters across the country, Stonewall is a grassroots force for social change within our movement and within our party.
1. Elect More Pro-Equality Democrats
2. Improve the Democratic Party
cause.mission: An exciting community of LGBT & Allied Democrats.
cause.name: Stonewall Democrats
